items.sentence: Tom didn\'t get the raise that he\'d been promised.
Tom told me he\'d give me that book if I wanted it.
Tom can speak French much more fluently than I can.
Tom\'s doctor told him that he should quit smoking.
Tom\'s new wife is young enough to be his daughter.
If Tom could do that, he would\'ve already done it.
If Tom could do that, he would\'ve already done so.
If Tom is going to the zoo with you, I\'ll go, too.
Tom learned about Mary\'s death later that morning.
You\'re the tallest one in your class, aren\'t you?
After reading Tom\'s letter, Mary burst out crying.
Maybe Tom did the right thing for the wrong reason.
Maybe we should ask Tom if he wants this old piano.
Do you know what they call a French horn in French?
Do you want to come over and watch a movie with me?
Tom isn\'t really as rich as everyone thinks he is.
Tom knows he should do it, but he doesn\'t want to.
You should probably tell Tom you intend to do that.
Tom discovered that Mary had dated his best friend.
Tom says that he used to hang out with the Beatles.
Is it true that you learned French all by yourself?
It sounds like you have class on Saturdays as well.
Let\'s just pretend like we don\'t know each other.
Tom is the only one who really knows what happened.
Is this the first time you\'ve eaten Japanese food?
I wouldn\'t do that for all the money in the world.
Call me when you get there, so I know you\'re safe.
Tom slowed down at the stop sign, but didn\'t stop.
Tom told me that it was possible to rent a bicycle.
I wasn\'t careful, and now I\'m sunburned all over.
Tom wouldn\'t let his children use his power tools.
I promise that I won\'t let anything happen to you.
I promised Tom we wouldn\'t sing that song tonight.
Are there any girls here that you haven\'t yet met?
Are you saying that you don\'t know how to do this?
I\'d like you to look after my dog while I\'m away.
We\'re pleased with the way things have turned out.
We\'ve been asked to self-quarantine for two weeks.
Tom should be out of the hospital by next Saturday.
Tom threw the car keys to Mary and she caught them.
Tom told Mary that the police were looking for him.
Tom told me he never wanted to work for his father.
I\'m not the only one who thinks Tom is overweight.
I\'ve been coming to work one train earlier lately.
If I\'m reincarnated, I want to come back as a cat.
Mary was the prettiest girl that Tom had ever seen.
My father speaks French better than my mother does.
The old man loaded his mule with bags full of sand.
The train that Tom was riding was hit by lightning.
There are cherry trees on both sides of the street.
